title: where practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Redundancy Payments Act 1967
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 

(Section 12A(2)) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited redundancy payment act 1967 (section 12a(2)) (covid-19) (no 2) order 2020

title: where practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the
heading: 2. The 17th day of September 2020 is hereby specified as the date to
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of September 2020 is hereby specified as the date to 
which the emergency period, as defined in subsection (5) of section 12A 
(inserted by section 29 of the Emergency Measures in the Public Interest 
(Covid-19) Act 2020 (No. 2 of 2020)) of the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 
(No. 21 of 1967), shall be extended. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 August, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [290]
text_norm: 2 17th day september 2020 hereby specified date emergency period defined subsection (5) section 12a (inserted section 29 emergency measure public interest (covid-19) act 2020 (no 2 2020)) redundancy payment act 1967 (no 21 1967) shall extended given official seal government 4 august 2020 micheal martin taoiseach 4 290

title: where practicable, the effect of the spread of that disease and to mitigate the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order extends, until 17th September 2020, the emergency period during 
which section 12 of the Redundancy Payments Act 1967 shall not have effect. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [290] 5
